advancements.time_traveling.root.title: Time Travel Mod
advancements.time_traveling.doesnt_look_: Get killed by a Temporal Explosion
advancements.time_traveling.better_than_: Fully repair any item in a Temporal Cauldron
chat.time_travel_mod.outdated: A new Time Travel Mod version (%s) is available! Check it out on its CurseForge page!
death.attack.temporal_anomaly: %s was nullified by a temporal anomaly
gui.tm.error: You can't travel to the time line you're already in, or travel from the Nether or the End!
gui.tm_engineer_book.introduction: Welcome to the Time Machine Engineer's Book! This book is your guide to building and upgrading a Time Machine, as well as to any plugins you've installed.
gui.tm_engineer_book.tms_introduction: To travel to other Timelines you will need a Time Machine. A Time Machine is a multi-block structure made with four different blocks: basic blocks (the structure), core blocks (the engine), upgrade blocks (these change behaviour), and a control panel. You may choose to place an upgrade block in any place where a basic block is valid. After you've built your Time Machine, go inside it and right-click the control panel. A menu will allow you to select your destination Timeline. The available Timelines will depend on the Time Machine tier. Select one and you will Time Travel for the first time. The Time Machine's engine needs a moment to cool down before you can use it again. If you try to mine the engine while it's cooling down, it will explode, leaving a time hole. There is also a very low chance of a Temporal Explosion occurring any time you use a Time Machine.
gui.tm_engineer_book.upgrades_introducti: Time Machine Upgrades are blocks that can be placed in a Time Machine replacing some of the basic blocks. Upgrades extend the functionality of Time Machines by improving their stats or introducing completely new mechanics. Read one upgrade's page to find out what it does change and which Time Machines are compatible with it.
gui.time_travel_mod.time_machine.title: Time Machine Destination Selector
gui.time_travel_mod.time_machine.descrip: The Time Machine is ready, select your destination:
There's no timeline that matches dimension %s
text.autoconfig.time_travel_mod.option.c: When enabled the Timelines have their own music
time_travel_mod.error.not_built.client: The Time Machine isn't correctly built!
time_travel_mod.error.not_built.server: The Time Machine used by the player isn't built
time_travel_mod.error.hot_cores.client: The Time Machine core has to cool down!
time_travel_mod.error.hot_cores.server: The Time Machine core of the Time Machine used by the player isn't cooled down
time_travel_mod.error.player_outside.cli: You must be inside of the Time Machine!
time_travel_mod.error.player_outside.ser: The player isn't inside of the Time Machine
time_travel_mod.error.overloaded.server: The Time Machine used by the player is overloaded
time_travel_mod.error.unreachable_timeli: The destination Timeline is unreachable with this Time Machine!
The destination Timeline is unreachable with the Time Machine used by the player.
time_travel_mod.error.same_timeline.clie: The destination Timeline can't be the same as your current Timeline
time_travel_mod.error.same_timeline.serv: The player selected his current Timeline as the destination Timeline
time_travel_mod.error.incompatible_upgra: The following Time Machine Upgrades are incompatible: %s
time_travel_mod.cheater_report: A Time Travel request was received in the server, but the player who sent it (%s) is possibly cheating. Reason: %s. We suggest you to %s him.
tm.time_travel_mod.creative.description: This item is only available in Creative mode. Using it allows you to travel to any time period without restrictions or cool downs.
tm.time_travel_mod.creative.name: Creative Time Machine
tm.time_travel_mod.tier_1.description: A very simple Time Machine that only reaches to the Old West.
tm.time_travel_mod.tier_1.name: Tier 1 Time Machine
tm.time_travel_mod.big_tier_1.descriptio: A bigger version of the Tier 1 Time Machine, so you can fit two more friends!
tm.time_travel_mod.big_tier_1.name: Big Tier 1 Time Machine
tm_upgrade.time_travel_mod.tracker.name: Time Machine Tracker
tm_upgrade.time_travel_mod.tracker.descr: This upgrade will configure its adjacent Time Machine Recaller Blocks when you use the Time Machine. When a Time Machine Recaller Block is configured its center turns green and, when powered with redstone, it will return the configured Time Machine to your Timeline. If you travel across various Timelines, you will need to install a Time Machine recaller on every stop.
text.autoconfig.time_travel_mod.option.c: If this is disabled you won't be notified of mod updates at world joining
If this is disabled game masters (ops) won't be notified when a possible cheater is detected
